import './App.css'; import React, {useState} from 'react' import Context from './context' import BaseNav from './Basic/header' import BaseFooter from './Basic/footer' import UserList from './Users/UserList' import Modal from './Modal/Modal' import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' document.body.style = 'background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);'; function App() { const [users, setUsers ]= useState( [ {id: '', name: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', age: 24, sex: 'Male'}, {id: '', name: 'Albert', lastName: 'Einstein', age: 124, sex: 'Male'}, {id: '', name: 'Feen', lastName: 'Fargoos', age: 45, sex: 'Male'}, {id: '', name: 'Lili', lastName: 'Batonchek', age: 24, sex: 'Female'}, {id: '', name: 'Karen', lastName: 'Lawson', age:67, sex: 'Female'}, {id: '', name: 'Marshal', lastName: 'Batonchek', age: 24, sex: 'Male'}, {name: 'Ted', lastName: 'Mosbey', age:67, sex: 'Male'} ] ) function removeUser(id){ setUsers(users.filter(user => user.id !== id)) } return (
Active Option 2 Disabled
Name Lastname Age Sex Edit
); } export default App;
